forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 36. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost before 8am. Sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 1 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the clock ticks past midnight, Boston rests under a blanket of tranquility, the horizon illuminated only by the soft twinkle of distant lights. The clear sky whispers promises of an invigorating dawn, suggesting that the chill in the air will give way to warmth and sunshine as the day unfolds. With frost weaving its delicate web across lawns come morning, it would be wise to step outside wearing layers; a cozy jacket for the early hours will soon surrender to the gentle embrace of sun-kissed temperatures.

As the sun rises, it will reveal a picturesque day—sunny skies stretching wide above, a palette mixed with the vibrant hues of autumn. The light westward breeze will carry the scent of fresh air, perfect for a leisurely stroll through the city’s iconic neighborhoods or perhaps enjoying a warming cup of coffee at a local café. Whether wandering through the historic streets or finding a quiet park to read, today promises an inviting backdrop to the simple pleasures of life.
